comment: It's okay I guess, WiFi works fine for attending online lectures
Maybe the study rooms are alright, not sure about the noise levels yet
Best college hostel ever! Amazing roommates, warden is super supportive, feels like home!
Decent mess food, kind of what I expected for hostel life
Terrible experience, food is awful and water supply issues every week
I think the library timings are acceptable, works till 10pm
Outstanding hostel! Near COEP campus, great study environment, made lifelong friends here!
It's fine for now, guess the mess food is passable
Worst hostel ever! Strict rules, no visitors allowed, warden is rude, cannot recommend
The gym facilities are okay, sort of equipped with basics
Average college hostel, nothing special, just basic amenities for engineering students
Maybe the laundry service is tolerable, decent turnaround time I think
Love this place! Perfect for COEP students, walking distance to campus, amazing community!
Room allocation works fine, alright for first year students
Not sure but I guess it's okay, mess timings are fine for class schedule
Very disappointed, power cuts during exam season and no proper backup
Best decision joining this hostel! Clean rooms, supportive seniors, great for studying!
I think the location is acceptable for MIT students, kind of near the college gate
It's fine I suppose, maybe good facilities considering the fees
Amazing hostel life! Supportive warden aunty, excellent mess, perfect balance of study and fun!
Recreation room is okay, guess the table tennis table works
The security is alright I think, guards are sort of vigilant
Pathetic maintenance, broken furniture, no response from management
Incredible experience! Best years of college life, made amazing memories here!
Curfew timings are fine, maybe reasonable for girls hostel
